title: 98: Going Deep ft. Chad and JT
description:
Stokers, Sloots, we’re joining forces. This week Sofia is accompanied by political activists Chad Kroeger and JT Parr! Fresh off of Jimmy Kimmel and Late Night with Seth Meyers, Chad and JT made sure to make a pit stop to teach the Sloots everything there is to know about fully embodying the stoke and going deep. Together the trio takes a stand against same-sex marriage and why the rest of the world, including you should be on board as well…

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/ 

Dipsea: http://www.dipseastories.com/SOFIA for 30 days full access
